title: Zettai ni Me wo Tsukerarete ha Ikenai Vtuber ni Mitsukatte Shimatta - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Showbiz
author: 横糸圭
description:
10,000 subscribers. Being a Vtuber isn’t enough to cover his living expenses, so he works another job every day and streams as a secondary job.

Then, the popular female Vtuber with 1 million subscribers, Yuugure Tsukihi, suddenly found him.

「I’ll give you a red superchat so quit work and focus on being a Vtuber!」
「I can’t……my ear is being impregnated just by his voice……っ♡」
「Won’t you become my gigolo?」

Tsukihi, who tells him to quit his job and stream more.
The shippers that appear whenever they collab.
A pushy kouhai at his workplace.
His supportive otaku manager who knows his true face.

The curtains rise on this amazing, chaotic, and idiotic comedy.>
